text: Ela Mishra is an Indian history scholar, social activist and speaker from Deoband, Uttar Pradesh. She received her PhD degree in History from Chaudhary Charan Singh University on Silk Letter Movement. She is the founder of Ela Charitable Trust. ==Birth and education== Ela Mishra was born to a Hindu familyin Saharanpur, a city in Indian state of Uttar Pradesh on 12 March 1986. Ela completed her B.Ed. and M.Ed. degrees from Maharshi Dayanand University in Rohtak, Haryana. She received her PhD degree in History from Chaudhary Charan Singh University on the Silk Letter Movement. ==Career== Mishra's book Reshmi Rumal Shadyantra was released by former Vice President of India Mohammad Hamid Ansari in February 2017. Mishra established a social welfare trust named Ela Charitable Trust on 24 April 2018. The trust focuses on education and good health of poor Muslim girls. ==Literary works== * Reshmi Rumaal Shadyantra (Hindi) ==References== Category:Living people Category:Scholars from Uttar Pradesh Category:Muslim scholars Category:Indian scholars of Islam Category:1986 births Category:People from Deoband Category:Converts to Islam from Hinduism
title: Ela Mishra
